Title: Windows 8 App Design Reference Template: Block Style Color
Description: Block Style Color template will help if you want to build an app which needs a Variable Size Content display blocks.
HomeWiki:
Disclaimer: The template provided in the form of Visual Studio project (C# and JS) is meant to act as a starter kit for Windows 8 Store apps development. You are recommended to change or modify the look and feel to suit the branding that is required for your app. The template by no means restricts you to stick to the layout, navigation or other aspects indicated.

Project Description

Block Style Color template will help if you want to build an app which needs a Variable Size Content display blocks

The Block Style Color template contains placeholders for Category and Detail Page. You can leverage this style if your implementation scenario is closest to this template.

Download includes the following

  • Source (C# and JS)
  • Package
  • Snapshots
  • Documentation
